issues.message: Consider using more general type 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' instead of 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.

Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string, string[]>>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string[]>'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Persistence.IWithPersistenceId' instead of 'Akka.Persistence.Journal.AsyncWriteTarget.ReadHighestSequenceNr'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Persistence.IPersistentRepresentation' instead of 'Akka.Persistence.Persistent'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Tools.MatchHandler.MatchBuilder<object>' instead of 'Akka.Tools.MatchHandler.MatchBuilder'.
Consider using more general type 'System.IO.Stream' instead of 'System.IO.MemoryStream'.
Consider using more general type 'System.IO.Stream' instead of 'System.IO.MemoryStream'.
Consider using more general type 'System.IO.FileSystemInfo' instead of 'System.IO.FileInfo'.
